UnixGuru Hosting
Provider of Super Fast, Super Stable, Super Secure, Super Scalable shared hosting.
DDoS Protected Shared & Reseller LiteSpeed Hosting on Cloud Linux Servers
BitNinja Security & Comodo Web Application Firewall (for LiteSpeed)


All accounts come with:-

  • Cisco/Tilera/Arbor DDoS Protection
  • BitNinja Security
  • Comodo WAF (Web Application Firewall)
  • CloudLinux - Stability, Security & Performance
  • LiteSpeed Web Server (with LiteMage the world's fastest Magento Cache, 20x Faster than NGINX & Turpentine(Varnish)
  • LiteMage Unlimited (Make sure that for LiteMage you only compare us with other LiteMage Unlimited hosts)
  • LiteSpeed LSCWPs the fastest WordPress Cache available
  • LetsEncrypt Free Multi-Domain SSL Certificates
  • Softaculous Script Installer
  • Patchman (automated Vulnerability patching)
  • UG SiteBuilder
  • R1Soft CDP (Continuous Data Protection) backups


LiteSpeed Hosting

  • Between 400% and 4000% faster than Apache, depending on the workload type.
  • LiteSpeed Cache, switch on/off in your .htaccess file to create blisteringly fast websites
  • LiteMage Cache, the world's fastest Magento Caching system, 20 x Faster than NGINX with Turpentine(Varnish)
  • LSCWP, the fastest Wordpress cache for shared hosting
  • Extra built-in security & anti-DDoS features

Geolocalised IPs for 13 European Countries:

  • Belgium
  • Britain/United Kingdom
  • Czech Republic
  • Finland
  • France
  • Germany
  • Ireland
  • Italy
  • Lithuania
  • Netherlands
  • Poland
  • Portugal
  • Spain

IPs are advertised in all regional PoPs.

Geographically Dispersed DNS Servers
4 x Fully DDoS Protected Nameservers

Reseller Hosting

All reseller account come with a dedicated IP address

Reseller Hosting Pricing Plans

Reseller accounts are white-labelled, so your customers will not know they are hosted with us unless you tell them.

  • Starter Reseller - £9.99/month
    • 10 Domains
    • 10GB Disk Space
    • 100GB Bandwidth
    • 1 Dedicated IP Address Only
  • Standard Reseller - £19.99/month
    • 100 Domains
    • 50 C'Panel Users
    • 50GB Disk Space
    • 1000GB Bandwidth
    • 1 Dedicated IP Address (more can be purchased)

Advanced & Ultimate Reseller accounts also include:

  • 1 x IP in each of the above 13 European zones (described above), available in a single reseller account.
  • 24 x Extra UK IPs in separate Class C (/24) networks
  • 10 x Extra German IPs in separate Class C (/24) networks
  • 7 x Extra Finnish IPs in separate Class C (/24) networks
  • 3 x Extra French IPs in separate Class C (/24) networks
  • 1 x Extra Polish IPs in a separate Class C (/24) network

More than 50 IPs to choose from!

This allows you to resell hosting in any of these regions and provide a "local" IP Address.
Our fast European network means that any IP responds quickly across Europe as all

  • Advanced Reseller - £29.99/month
    • 100 Domains
    • 100 C'Panel Users
    • 100GB Disk Space
    • 1000GB Bandwidth
    • 1 Dedicated IP Address, 50+ IPs from Separate Class C networks including 13 EU Zones
  • Ultimate Reseller - £39.99/month

    • 200 C'Panel Users
    • 100GB Disk
    • 2000GB Bandwidth
    • 1 Dedicated IP Address, 50+ IPs from Separate Class C networks including 13 EU Zones


System Software

Modern CLLMPP Stack (CloudLinux/LiteSpeed/MariaDB & PHP/Perl)
  • CloudLinux 6.8
  • LiteSpeed 5.1.12 (Apache compatible drop in replacement)
  • PHP 5.6.30 (Default)
  • MariaDB 10.1.18
  • Exim 4.88 with UG SpamBuster v3.11.3

Selectable Hardened PHP Versions (per user)
  • PHP 7.1.1 - with Customisable modules (Cutting Edge, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 7.0.15 - with Customisable modules (Current, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 5.6.30 - with Customisable modules (Current, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 5.5.38 - with Customisable modules (Legacy - Hardened PHP by CloudLinux, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 5.4.45 - with Customisable modules (Legacy - Hardened PHP by CloudLinux, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 5.3.29 - with Customisable modules (Legacy - Hardened PHP by CloudLinux, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 5.2.17 - with Customisable modules (Legacy - Hardened PHP by CloudLinux, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 5.1.6 - with Customisable modules (Legacy - Hardened PHP by CloudLinux, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 4.4.9 - with Customisable modules (Legacy - Hardened PHP by CloudLinux, secured by CageFS)
(Infact all PHP Versions are secured by CageFS, Virtual Filesystem Technology, each user has their own copy of the binaries, so cannot harm other users).

R1Soft Continuous Data Protection

  • Snapshots taken every hour
  • Hourly archives retained for 24 hours
  • Daily archives retained for 31 days
  • Weekly archives retained for 1 month
  • Monthly archives retained for 3 months

Backups can be accessed from the control panel to restore back to any archive.

Discount Code

  • Get 95% off your first purchase month of Shared or Reseller hosting (when paid for monthly).
    • Code: 95%OFF1STMONTH (Valid for use until Dec 31st 2017)


Provisioning/Setup
  • Immediate Provisioning on receipt of payment via PayPal, Major Credit-Cards, BitCoin or Direct-Debit
